Perceptor::

"What a show off!"replied annoyed the male "but that would ba a 
dishonorable advantange, why don't we shot at time... when We said 
three."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He sighs.  "Fine, and it will be a fine battle."  He smirks 
at 
> Perceptor.  "I'll tell you what.  To make this fair you get to 
take the first 
> shot.  Be warned.  If I am not dead or significantly unconscious 
you'd best 
> flee quickly."  He glowers at Perceptor.  "I was once the greatest 
general 
> the Tripredacus had ever known.  The only one to ever defeat me in 
single 
> combat was he who replaced me.  And I assure you.  You are not 
him."
